feed.title: DnL Server Manager Version Feed
feed.subtitle: This is the Dark and Light Server Manager beta version feed.

ul.li: Dino and Resource Grids - fixed bug where the Mod column would not be updated when changing languages.
Game Map droplist - added TheShard map.
Game Map droplist - moved TheSacredPath map to the gamedata file.
Settings Window - changed the filter drop lists to show the Mod name. The list is now dynamic and will display mods from your own custom gamedata files.

p.font: WARNING: Before you restart your servers, check that the Map Name is set correctly.
